00017 PointShape::PointShape() : convertable(false)
00018 {
00019     line = static_cast<LineRenderable*>(SceneManager::get()->createComponent("LineRenderable", "outline"));
00020     SceneNode* node = SceneManager::get()->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode("outline");
00021     node->setPosition(hgeVector(0, 0));
00022     node->attachComponent(line);
00023     node->setZ(0.3);
00024 }
00025 
00026 PointShape::~PointShape()
00027 {
00028     SceneManager::get()->destroySceneNode("outline");
00029     SceneManager::get()->destroyComponent("outline", true);
00030 }
00031 
00032 const string PointShape::getSummary()
00033 {
00034     string summary = "Line points: ";
00035 
00036     for (int i = 0; i < points.size(); ++i)
00037         summary += Utils::get()->formatString("%i=[%.1f %.1f] ", i, points[i].x, points[i].y);
00038 
00039     return summary;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void PointShape::addPoint(const hgeVector& point)
00043 {
00044     points.push_back(point);
00045 
00046     if (points.size() > 1)
00047         line->addLine(points[points.size() - 2], points[points.size() - 1], hgeColor(1, 1, 1, 1));
00048 
00049     Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00050     SceneManager* scene = SceneManager::get();
00051 
00052     SceneNode* node = scene->getSceneNode("outline");
00053 
00054     SceneNode* caption = node->createChildSceneNode("caption " + utils->intToString(points.size()));
00055     caption->setPosition(hgeVector(point.x, point.y - 20));
00056 
00057     TextRenderable* text = static_cast<TextRenderable*>(scene->createComponent("TextRenderable", "caption " + utils->intToString(points.size())));
00058     text->setFont("mainFont");
00059     text->setAlignment(ALIGN_CENTER);
00060     text->setColor(hgeColor(1, 1, 0, 1));
00061     text->setText(utils->formatString("%i [%.1f %.1f]", points.size() - 1, point.x, point.y));
00062 
00063     caption->attachComponent(text);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void PointShape::clearPoints()
00067 {
00068     Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00069     for (int i = 1; i <= points.size(); ++i)
00070     {
00071         SceneManager::get()->destroySceneNode("caption " + utils->intToString(i));
00072         SceneManager::get()->destroyComponent("caption " + utils->intToString(i), true);
00073     }
00074 
00075     points.clear();
00076     line->clearLines();
00077     convertable = false;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void PointShape::finalize()
00081 {
00082     if (points.size() > 2)
00083     {
00084         line->addLine(points[points.size() - 1], points[0], hgeColor(1, 1, 1, 1));
00085         convertable = true;
00086     }
00087 }
